entries.name: Faceless One (N'raqi)

traits.name: Corrupting Touch
traits.effect: A sapping malison reduces the target’s potency.

traits.name: Gore-Plated Bulk
traits.effect: Grotesque mass shrugs off lesser blows.

traits.name: Possession
traits.effect: Briefly overwhelms a weakened will.

traits.name: Crushing Blow
traits.effect: Slams enemy with overwhelming force, staggering target briefly.

entries.description: Void-spawned lieutenants of the Old Gods, all eyes, tendrils, and whispers.

entries.name: C’Thrax (Faceless General)

traits.name: Void Strike
traits.effect: Strikes the target with a warped bolt of shadow, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Abyssal Hex
traits.effect: Afflicts target with murky visions and fear.

traits.name: Shadow Volley
traits.effect: Unleashes a deadly volley of shadow bolts.

traits.name: Summon Major Void
traits.effect: Calls a major aberrant void spawn to the field.

entries.description: War-champions among the faceless, towering horrors bearing Old God sigils.

entries.name: Forgotten One

traits.name: Void Strike
traits.effect: Strikes the target with a warped bolt of shadow, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Binding Decay
traits.effect: Inflicts with an eldritch rot that gnaws the target over several rounds.

traits.name: Void Bolt
traits.effect: Blasts enemies with void energy.

traits.name: Summon Minor Void
traits.effect: Calls a minor aberrant void spawn to the field.

entries.description: A lumpen offshoot of Old God growth; mouths and eyes without reason.

entries.name: Eye of the Old God

traits.name: Whispering Darkness
traits.effect: Whispers from the dark unnerve the target, forcing them to flee.

traits.effect: Grotesque mass shrugs off lesser blows.

traits.effect: Briefly overwhelms a weakened will.

traits.name: Void Curse
traits.effect: An eldritch malediction afflicts the target, weaking them progressively each turn until cured.

entries.description: A floating ocular horror that projects the will of its master.

traits.name: Void Root
traits.effect: Grasping tendrils seize the target in place, preventing movement.

traits.effect: An eldritch malediction afflicts the target, weaking them progressively each turn until cured.

traits.effect: Slams enemy with overwhelming force, staggering target briefly.

entries.description: A sinewed conduit for void corruption, writhing with malevolence.

entries.name: Void Lasher

traits.name: Corrupting Touch
traits.effect: A sapping malison reduces the target’s potency.

traits.name: Void Lash
traits.effect: Strikes with void-hardened force, dealing direct damage.

entries.description: Fast, tendriled attackers that lash minds and flesh alike.

entries.name: Silithid Worker

traits.name: Agonize
traits.effect: Blights the target with fel-empowered magic, dealing direct damage and leaving a Burning effect.

traits.name: Hive Dash
traits.effect: Skitters in a rapid dash.

traits.name: Amber Sting
traits.effect: A scorpid sting that inflicts poison damage over several turns.

entries.description: Base drones of the Silithid hives, tireless diggers and swarmers.

entries.name: Silithid Soldier

traits.name: Agonize
traits.effect: Blights the target with fel-empowered magic, dealing direct damage and leaving a Burning effect.

traits.name: Acid Spit
traits.effect: A volatile burst of acid spit out at enemies, inflicting damage upon impact and leaving the Poisoned debuff.

traits.name: Piercing Thrust
traits.effect: A carefully aimed thrust that punctures light armor.

entries.description: Hardened warriors forming the bulk of hive armies.

entries.name: Silithid Wasp

traits.name: Bone Rot
traits.effect: A disease that rots the bone away, weakening the target and slowing them until cured.

traits.name: Amber Sting
traits.effect: A scorpid sting that inflicts poison damage over several turns.

traits.name: Savage Lunge
traits.effect: Ferocious leap that rattles a defender’s guard.

entries.description: Aerial attackers used to harass and scatter foes.

entries.name: Silithid Colossus

traits.name: Eldritch Knockback
traits.effect: A violent spasm of force sends the target backward.

traits.name: Void Blade
traits.effect: Bypasses shields briefly.

traits.name: Skittering Rush
traits.effect: A rapid advance with chitinous blades, dealing direct damage.

entries.description: Titanic Silithid war-beasts worshipped as avatars of the hive.

entries.name: Nerubian Warrior

traits.name: Webbed Strike
traits.effect: A flurry of rapid strikes to victims already webbed, dealing double damage upon hit.

traits.name: Corrupted Bloodline
traits.effect: Resistant to necrotic effects and dark magic damage.

traits.name: Web Snare
traits.effect: Immobilizes the target in place.

entries.description: Soldiers of Azjol-Nerub, disciplined spiderfolk of the ancient empire.

entries.name: Nerubian Spiderlord

traits.name: Webbed Strike
traits.effect: A flurry of rapid strikes to victims already webbed, dealing double damage upon hit.

traits.name: Webbed Root
traits.effect: Thick webbing pins the target, preventing movement.

traits.name: Webbed Shield
traits.effect: Layered silk hardens into a carapace, reducing harm.

traits.name: Soul Beacon
traits.effect: Marks a target for undead minions, bolstering their damage and redirecting their focus.

entries.description: Towering Nerubian elites who anchor lines with webs and carapace.

entries.name: Nerubian Seer

traits.name: Mana Drain
traits.effect: Saps the mana from a target, Weakening them for a turn.

traits.name: Webbed Root
traits.effect: Thick webbing pins the target, preventing movement.

traits.name: Dark Vision
traits.effect: Peers into likely outcomes, reducing chance of ambush.

entries.description: Sorcerers who weave both magic and webbing into their warfare.

entries.name: Nerubian Commander

traits.name: Blasphemous Ward
traits.effect: Demonic warding canibalizes incoming harm to empower your next attack.

traits.name: Webbed Root
traits.effect: Thick webbing pins the target, preventing movement.

traits.name: Cage of Ribs
traits.effect: Interlocking bones form a near-impervious shell.

traits.name: Raise Greater Undead
traits.effect: Reanimates major entities as undead pawns.

entries.description: Strategic leaders of Nerubian armies, often resisting Scourge domination.

traits.name: Corrupting Touch

traits.name: Corrupting Touch
traits.effect: A sapping malison reduces the target’s potency.

traits.name: Summon Major Void
traits.effect: Calls a major aberrant void spawn to the field.

traits.name: Corrupting Touch
traits.effect: A sapping malison reduces the target’s potency.

traits.name: Whispers of the Void
traits.effect: Confuses nearby foes.

traits.effect: A flashing pulse that clings to the target and damages nearby enemies for several turns.

entries.description: A condensed knot of shadowstuff, scarcely bound into shape.

entries.name: Flesh Horror

traits.name: Gore Hook
traits.effect: Snags and drags prey into crushing reach.

traits.name: Bite and Hold
traits.effect: Clamps down with fangs and force, dealing direct damage and forcing the target to break free or suffer further damage.

traits.name: Cleave of Sewn Flesh
traits.effect: A sweeping butcher’s swing that cuts multiple foes and leaves bleeding wounds.

entries.description: Meat and bone rallied by alien will into a hateful shape.

entries.name: Shambling Aberration

traits.name: Eldritch Knockback
traits.effect: A violent spasm of force sends the target backward.

traits.name: Agonize
traits.effect: Blights the target with fel-empowered magic, dealing direct damage and leaving a Burning effect.

entries.description: A lopsided heap of sinew animated by whispers.

entries.name: Nightmare Amalgam

traits.name: Void Curse
traits.effect: An eldritch malediction afflicts the target, weaking them progressively each turn until cured.

traits.name: Circling Fear
traits.effect: Forces the target to flee or lose control.

entries.description: A tangle of nightmare briars and flesh, half-remembered by a sleeping world.

entries.name: Corrupted Horror

traits.name: Sleep Spores
traits.effect: Dream-haze weighs on the target, reducing movement speed.

traits.name: Whispering Darkness
traits.effect: Whispers from the dark unnerve the target, forcing them to flee.

traits.name: regeneration
traits.effect: Natural regeneration that passively restores 1 health each turn, except when below half health.

traits.name: Void Pulse
traits.effect: A flashing pulse that clings to the target and damages nearby enemies for several turns.

entries.description: A nightmare-touched brute that leaves dread wherever it lurches.

entries.name: Mana Anomaly

traits.name: Arcane Blast
traits.effect: Releases a bolt of prismatic mana at range, dealing damage.

traits.name: Shimmering Barrier
traits.effect: An arcane barrier shimmers, reducing incoming harm.

traits.name: Arcane Explosion
traits.effect: Releases a surge of arcane force at close range, dealing damage to all nearby targets. Doubles damage each time used in succession.

entries.description: A knot of stray mana that learned to hate the hands that wove it.

entries.name: Temporal Anomaly

traits.name: Chrono Breath
traits.effect: Breathes a cone of sand-laden time that damages enemies before it.

traits.name: Sandstorm
traits.effect: Summons a blistering storm of sand that damages and blinds any enemies in the area.

entries.description: A time-slipped echo made resentful by paradox.

entries.name: Living Ooze

traits.name: Arcane Flood
traits.effect: Unleashes unstable energies, reducing hit chances for all nearby casters for a turn.

traits.name: Caustic Strike
traits.effect: Slams into the foe, splashing corrosive filth that burns over time.

traits.name: Flood of Ooze
traits.effect: A flood of ooze slows down all nearby targets.

entries.description: A hungry slick of protoplasm animated by wrong magic.
